bug.author: scarlett2018
bug.summary: Clone job on INT bed did not update the JobName
bug.description:
On INT Bed How to reproduce
in Home Page, my recent job, find one job; open the job, and click clone.
Expectation the job will be cloned and able to submit What I got <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/39592018/58007575-29f99000-7b1d-11e9-8e9e-544ae9120cb9.png></denchmark-link>
Note: the clone works well when I clone others' job.
